Replace.Text: I, finally got rid of the shackles that day, but I still don't think it's a good thing.

The legends from that distant and deeply rooted in the hearts of the people have brought unity and revolution to fantasy. As a distant sinner, he is worthy of his title of EX; as a dark man, he brings hope to all living beings. Rumia, lead us out of the boundless chaos to re-open up our fantasies.
Population growth rate -25%, each [ICON_Citizen] population in the city +3% [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value +2% [ICON_CULTURE] culture value.
+0.3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity and [ICON_CULTURE] culture value per round, +0.5 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value and [ICON_FAITH] faith value per round in the capital.

This is a fantasy of a certain world line. Hakurei Miko's crusade against the mutation was fruitless, but the culprit ended the mutation for some reason, but finally unified the monsters. Instead, the culprit became an important part of Gensokyo, and slowly paid for it. .

Who was the culprit of the mutation at that time? This period of history has been erased, leaving only legends circulating among the creatures of Gensokyo. And now the monsters are also difficult to verify, but it is rumored that he is the person in charge of the entire monster alliance, but he is the person in charge in the dark.

Today's union has gradually stabilized, and it is more and more like a country ruled by law. This is undoubtedly good for Gensokyo. All monsters can get along happily, and maybe one day humans and monsters will no longer interact with each other. Need to care about identity, which was unimaginable before.
As for the shadow of the stable alliance in the rumors, everyone may gradually no longer need it.

EX-Lumia’s testable name appeared (source P station): December 5, 2007 [NEWLINE] Due to the impression of Japanese games such as Dragon Quest at that time, according to inertial thinking, someone quickly created it. The second creation related to Ex Rumia after Rumia lifted the seal.

The specific performance of the character is as follows: [NEWLINE]1. Literally, various abilities increase after the seal is released, such as strength, agility, intelligence, etc. The concise explanation is to show the conventional Yujie temperament in the oriental worldview. Most intuitively, it is similar to the temperament of most of Yakumo Zi's fan creations [NEWLINE] 3. Highly mature thinking, similar to the logical thinking ability and life experience of a thousand-year-old monster. [NEWLINE]4. The ability to control darkness is strengthened, such as: the scope of influence becomes larger, and the ability to influence is strengthened (for example, it becomes able to isolate light, light waves, even air and matter), and can influence and manipulate more about "darkness" elements and so on.

In addition to the common changes of the characters, there are also some occasional elements as follows:[NEWLINE]1. Will hold a red and black European-style long sword, big sword, or super big sword. [NEWLINE]2. There will be wings made of black matter (or materialized darkness) behind you, usually 1 or 3 pairs of European angel wings that are mainly red or black, and others that dynamically change like liquid matter Wings", often only one pair. [NEWLINE]3. A crown of thorns or a red halo will appear on the head. Body, face, limbs were bloodied. [NEWLINE]4. The background behind is a red cross, or a blood moon, or other background elements mainly black and red.

In this MOD, it is set to unravel the seal and cause a very serious mutation, and defeat all the real strong men who tried to solve it in the mutation, and it is called an endlessly growing darkness. [NEWLINE]Because of his own strong and mature thinking ability, after being stalked by Hakurei Miko, he did not destroy Gensokyo in the end. Instead, he repented and began to unify the monsters to promote the development of Gensokyo. It is widely circulated among the people, it is too legendary but every monster believes in it, it can be said that EX Rumia is the god in their hearts.

EX Rumia is strong, usually despises many things, has a bad personality, and will spare no effort to fight back when provoked. So try not to make this legendary monster angry, but the good news is that because of her contempt, if you don't deliberately provoke her, it will not attract her hatred. If she has been completely angered, she may be wiped out if she is not strong enough to match the Miko.

The characteristic area of ​​the monster union, which does not replace the area, can be unlocked by scientific writing. Building [ICON_PRODUCTION] production costs twice as much as normal districts. Has a lot of output, if the city where it is located is not the capital, [ICON_FAITH] Faith output will be zero. [NEWLINE]Have three supporting buildings that don't increase age score. Items related to EX-Rumia can be performed after all buildings are constructed.

After understanding some knowledge brought by the outside world, the scholars of the monster alliance have great curiosity about monster power. After slowly evolving, they have developed such a knowledge to study the incredible energy of monster power. I also hope Traces of the legendary god can be found there.

There are so many inconceivable things in Gensokyo, but no one has systematically studied them. It is gratifying to finally have the energy to carry out these inconceivable researches after the unification of the monsters. As a sage, you have to start learning these research results , it can be seen that it is not unimportant.

Science is materialistic, while theology is idealistic, but both of them can play the same role in the development of this fantasy, but in the same way, one cannot be both idealistic and materialistic. The gods enshrined in the various shrines united by monsters have never been particular, but they are all surprisingly effective.

The characteristic area of ​​the combination of monsters, does not replace the area, unlocked by technology astrology. Building [ICON_PRODUCTION] production costs twice as much as normal districts. With a large amount of output, the city where the city is located has +25% population growth rate; but if the city where the city is located is not the capital and has a demon power research center, then -75% [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value output. [NEWLINE]Have three supporting buildings that don't increase age score. Items related to EX-Rumia can be performed after all buildings are constructed.
+{1_num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from adjacent Fey Research Center
+{1_num} [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from the adjacent Science Research Center
+{1_num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Technology value from adjacent other regions
+{1_num} [ICON_CULTURE] culture value from adjacent city center
+{1_num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture value from adjacent other districts
EX-Lumia's characteristic building does not consume productivity. [NEWLINE]EX-Rumia's ability will be reflected in this building, without this building there will be no ability bonus.

The statue of Rumia is based on the legend, people's imagination of her, and the final restored appearance, which represents people's belief in her. Nowadays, people can often see people wishing and looking up at the statue of Rumia. If the establishment of Gensokyo is the first inconceivable, then Rumia's unification of monsters is the second inconceivable in Gensokyo.
A place where past materials in various fields are recorded, making it easier to conduct more research. [NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production per era after construction.
It is a place to collect monster power, and providing data can also provide energy. [NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production per era after construction.

The research institute was born to stand at the forefront of demon power research, and the researchers have devoted their endless efforts. [NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science +4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production per era after construction.
Pray to the gods, get blessings, and achieve a happy life and a smooth career. [NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture each era after construction.

Unseen gods sometimes appear here, watching the worshipers with interest. [NEWLINE]In addition to the original [ICON_FAITH] faith value output, an additional [ICON_FAITH] faith value output equal to the area [ICON_CULTURE] culture value adjacent bonus is added, and each era after construction +2 [ICON_FAITH] faith value +2 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value. [NEWLINE]+4% to all cities equal to [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_SCIENCE] Science, [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production produced by [ICON_FAITH] Faith.

EX-Rumia's doll before the seal was lifted, has gathered a lot of beliefs, and is said to be very effective. [NEWLINE] After construction, the number of buildable areas in the city +1, and +4 [ICON_FAITH] belief value +4 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value every time an era passes.

EX-Lumia, a special unit. The combat power depends on the highest melee combat power of the trained unit. After the health value reaches zero, it will return to the capital. It needs to be obtained through the project of the Demon Power Research Center. [NEWLINE]+12 [ICON_Strength] combat strength as a super unit, regardless of area control.

EX-Rumia herself, as the dark side of Gensokyo, has never left the stage. After the stable alliance and retired, she turned to the dark side to support the alliance. In fact, every leader of the alliance knows the existence of this god and also Be aware of her contribution. She could take back her own power if she wanted to, but she never did. But if there is a crisis one day, she will definitely come forward again.

It has almost invincible strength, the power to crush everything; the speed as fast as a shadow; the calm and calm like a sage; the regeneration speed that cannot be captured by the naked eye; There is almost no way to defeat this darkness born to devour all. And when she went to the battlefield, she almost sentenced the enemy to death, and she alone was enough.
Super Unit - EX Rumia +12 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength

Rumia hasn't untied the seal for a long time since she started dealing with various things. She has to move around to regain her previous familiarity with power. After the liberation, the strength rose greatly, but that was only the beginning of darkness.
+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, regardless of damage debuffs.

The bloody Rumia who bloomed in the killing is the EX Rumia who really started to transform back into the horrible monster before. But this time it was to find the feeling in the liberation, and before it was to find blood in the seal to break the seal.
+4 [ICON_Strength] combat power, restore 15 [ICON_Damaged] points of health after killing an enemy unit.

In the past, Rumia at this time was just beginning to become EX Rumia, becoming calm, terrifyingly calm. It is no longer the childish swaying of power as before, but the purposeful destruction of the surrounding things. She has come back.
+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, full damage to city walls.

The power to obliterate everything slowly gathered in her hands. At that time, Hakurei Miko dodged this, but not everyone can have such an outrageous dodge ability. This time those powers will be unleashed on the enemies of Gensokyo.
+14 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting with full blood units, +7 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting with injured units

The barrage is ridiculous, EX Rumia is surrounded by an iron wall of darkness, which can resist all long-range attacks that try to inflict damage from the outside. Only by fighting with her at close range can there be a chance of injuring her and blocking her.

[ICON_AntiAir_Large] Anti-Air Combat Strength +200, and +200 when defending against long-range attacks [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength [NEWLINE] Recover [ICON_Damaged] HP by +5 every round, and it can be recovered after taking action
Creatures will be blocked by terrain, but light and darkness will never be. Shadows will move across the space silently and come to the things they want to devour.
+1 [ICON_Movement] movement, regardless of terrain movement debuffs, +3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength for every point of unused movement when attacking
Promotion: Gift of Blood +4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength
Promotion: Ruthless Killing Intent +4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Power
Ascension: Destruction of Being +14 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting unwounded units
Ascension: Destruction of Being +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting Wounded Units
Promotion: When defending against long-range attacks, +200 [ICON_Strength] Combat Power
Promotion: Disregarding yourself +200 [ICON_AntiAir_Large] Air Defense Combat Strength
Each new combat unit is EX-Rumia +1 [ICON_Strength] combat strength
Home city and capital +0.2 per round [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity.
"I will do it myself." [NEWLINE] The city where the city is located has obtained the unit EX-Rumia.
EX-Rumia +1 restores [ICON_Damaged] HP every round. [NEWLINE]Unlock new items after completing 10 times.
Each combat unit newly trained by civilization has +1 [ICON_Strength] combat power for EX-Rumia.
From the next round, EX=Rumia +1 [ICON_Strength] combat power every round.
All cities produce 1% of [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, [ICON_SCIENCE] technology, [ICON_CULTURE] culture
Rumia's strategy when she was almost lost at the time was to devour everything and destroy everything. Even though Rumia herself didn't want to admit it, that memory still remained in her heart.
Builder +1 [ICON_Movement] Mobility, city removes landforms and harvests resource output +25% [NEWLINE] (added by EX Rumia MOD)
Dislike all others, meet to start with a negative relationship.
Dislikes all others, meeting starts with negative relationship
I approve of you, now you are no longer scum.
What does the empire of monsters look like in your imagination? Come see for yourself.
your history? Your brilliance? No, it will immediately become a pile of charred ruins, by my own hands.
your history? Your brilliance? No, it will immediately become a pile of charred ruins, by my own hands.
This country may not give you a good impression, but I still wish you a good time.
If you don't accept it, please go back.
When I was still the same as before, I still often gave gifts to people, but I didn't expect that I would still give them now.
If you don't stop your actions, your body, your soul, your being, will be destroyed by me. (condemns you)
If you don't stop your actions, your body, your soul, your being, will be destroyed by me. (condemns you)
The endless darkness, the final disaster that annihilates everything, Rumia, no, EX-Rumia. You should hope that I am not your enemy.
Eternal darkness, this is the name of the capital, now you can come.
The location of the capital, don't you understand? Exchange your capital location with mine.
This is the agreement, don't worry, I'm not some unreasonable monster.
Hope you got the lesson you deserve, scum.
Do you think that such rhetoric can restore the endless anger you ignited? The darkness will eventually devour you scum, run! coward!
Well, the border is open to you for now.
Where's the rude request? Can I take it as a provocation?
Why does passing by seem to kill you in your eyes?
Are you showing off? I wish you the best just showing off next to me.
Who are you? Even if you don’t understand the warnings, are you being tough? Then you still want to take care of me?
In this case, I was negligent, so I will retire first.
Darkness will never, ever, be dispelled so easily. However, I have to admit that you have won, temporarily.
It seems that you are also good at doing business.
